text:
Holistic educational centre. My son learnt well in his Science and Creative writing. Centre has basketball boot camp for my son to learn sport.
During Circuit Breaker, lessons were conducted through Zoom and my child really benefitted. Thanks to Teacher Donnie and team

They provide coaching for adults too. Tutor BK helped me in learning Business Chinese for the past few months and I finally passed my test in Basic Chinese which is needed for my translation work. どうもありがとう (=“ “ )
Well tailored lessons for students staying in the heartland of AMK. Thumbs up!
The centre is clean and conducive for learning to take place.
